product_name: Patagonia Squeaky Clean Polo Shirt - Men's
long_description: The Patagonia Squeaky Clean Polo Shirt is made with soft organic cotton for T-shirt comfort that you can wear to the office. Made from certified 100% organic cotton for breathable comfort and easy care. Includes a patch pocket on the chest.
short_description: The Patagonia Squeaky Clean Polo Shirt is made with soft organic cotton for T-shirt comfort that you can wear to the office.
